code: var draggableToDock=function draggableToDock(view){return{draggable:true,onDragStart:function onDragStart(ev){var MainView=document.getElementById("MainView");var draggable=ev.target;setTimeout(function(){MainView.classList.add("drag");draggable.classList.add("drag");},1);ev.dataTransfer.setData("text",view);},onDragEnd:function onDragEnd(ev){var MainView=document.getElementById("MainView");var draggable=ev.target;setTimeout(function(){MainView.classList.remove("drag");draggable.classList.remove("drag");},1);}};};export default draggableToDock;
